verses.verse: And <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>: and <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>stead<s%>.
